name: Dynamics365DataExporter
description: Dynamics 365 Data Exporter using Capgemini.Xrm.DataMigration Engine.
author: capgemini-uk

inputs.name: batchSize
inputs.label: Export Record Batch Size
inputs.helpMarkDown: The number of records that can be in each export file.

inputs.name: pageSize
inputs.label: Export Query Page Size
inputs.helpMarkDown: The page size that will be used in the query to retrieve the records.

inputs.name: topCount
inputs.label: Export Query Top Count
inputs.helpMarkDown: The maximum amount of records that will be retrieved for an entity.

inputs.name: jsonFolderPath
inputs.label: JSON Output Folderpath
inputs.helpMarkDown: The folderpath where the exported files will be outputted.

inputs.name: connectionString
inputs.label: Connection String
inputs.helpMarkDown: ConnectionString to Dynamics 365 instance. [Microsoft Connection String Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/customer-engagement/developer/xrm-tooling/use-connection-strings-xrm-tooling-connect#create-a-connection-string)

inputs.name: onlyActive
inputs.label: Only Active Records
inputs.helpMarkDown: A flag to determine whether only Active records should be exported.

inputs.name: configFilePath
inputs.label: Export Config Filepath
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional: Filepath to Export Config file.

inputs.name: treatWarningsAsErrors
inputs.label: Treat Warnings as Errors
inputs.helpMarkDown: A flag to determine whether warnings should be treated as errors.
